'''Super OS''' (formerly: Super Ubuntu)<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/ hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/]</ref> is a [[gratis|freely-available]] [[Linux]]-based [[operating system]]. It is a [[Software remastering|remastered]] version of [[Ubuntu]]<ref>[http://linux.softpedia.com/progDownload/Super-OS-Download-44128.html linux.softpedia.com/progDownload/Super-OS-Download-44128.html]</ref> made with [[reconstructor]].<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS Super OS (Super Ubuntu)]</ref> Its main goal is to provide an âOut of the Boxâ experience,<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_Ubuntu_FAQ Super Ubuntu FAQ]</ref> containing various enhancements over Ubuntu. It has the goal of remaining 100% compatible with Ubuntu<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS</ref>.

'''Super OS''' (formerly: Super Ubuntu)<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/ hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/]</ref> is a [[gratis|freely-available]] [[Linux]]-based [[operating system]]. It is a [[Software remastering|remastered]] version of [[Ubuntu]]<ref>[http://linux.softpedia.com/progDownload/Super-OS-Download-44128.html linux.softpedia.com/progDownload/Super-OS-Download-44128.html]</ref> made with [[reconstructor]].<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS Super OS (Super Ubuntu)]</ref> Its main goal is to provide an âOut of the Boxâ experience,<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_Ubuntu_FAQ Super Ubuntu FAQ]</ref> containing various enhancements over [[Ubuntu]]. It has the goal of remaining 100% compatible with Ubuntu<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS</ref>.
